p: The skin microbiota diversity and the cutaneous microenvironment (dry, moist, and sebaceous) can influence the wound repair process and the occurrence of skin infections [ 39]. There exist four prevailing bacterial phyla on the skin: Actinobacteria, Proteobacteria, Firmicutes, and Bacteroidetes that arrange into biofilms and actively take part in the inhibition of skin infections [ 40].
